nodes.text: Green Milk Cooler was an alcoholic beverage sold at the Milk Stand in Batuu's Black Spire Outpost. The drink was based on the original non-alcoholic frozen green milk drink available at the stand, which used imported milk from thala-sirens, but with the addition of an alcohol.

Green Milk and Blue Milk drinks were available at the Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge Milk Stand in both Disneyland and Disney's Hollywood Studios on opening day, but only the Hollywood Studios version included alcoholic "cooler" variations of the beverages. The menu's description of the Green Milk Cooler reads, "Plant-based blend of Coconut and Rice Milk with zippy Citrus and tropical characteristics featuring Corazon Blanco Tequila."
